Title: 008: Data Science in Computer Games, Learning to Learn and a 40M Euro Case Study with Ulf Morys
Description:
In this session of the Super Data Science Podcast, I chat with Ubisoft Finance Director Ulf Morys. You will learn what data science is in computer games, how to build a data landscape and know what are the different ways of using data to save millions.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at https://www.superdatascience.com/8
